Text.Page:
This grove is sacred to the kingdom.

Unfortunately, those awful {@LinkCreature:23#13#searing fangspawns} are wrecking it.

My troops will be roasted if they take them on. I need you to deal with this.

Well, those fire-breathing freaks shouldn't be a problem for some time.

Thank you. Our heritage is part of who we are. We must protect it.
